name: wormhole-demo
description: Simplified cross-chain messaging demo between Aztec and EVM using Wormhole

scripts.build: npm run build:aztec && npm run build:evm
scripts.deploy:local: npm run deploy:local:aztec && npm run deploy:local:evm
scripts.deploy:local:evm: cd packages/evm && forge script script/DeployMessageBridge.s.sol --rpc-url localhost:8545 --broadcast
